function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of risk management and factors affecting implementation in the workplace","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Severe drop in productivity due to social distancing and work-from-home measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interruption of business projects and decrease in revenue","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in the workplace due to physical presence of employees","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relocation of operation expenses to workplace modification activities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transition from physical workspace to virtual and agile workspace","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of face-to-face communication and team working atmosphere","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Working from home affecting employee working quality and output","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health and safety concerns related to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of concrete plan for office redesign","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in office space provision","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards soft renovation instead of major refurbishment projects","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective social distancing measures in the workplace","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate workplace health and safety monitoring","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient support for remote working employees","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective risk management in workplace modification activities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low adoption of engineering control activities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uneven compliance with community measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for covid-19 infection cases in the office modification activities at the operational level","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on administrative control and personal protection for risk prevention measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with lockdown procedures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased transmission measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate workplace modification practice for pandemic control","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious
